SEARCH
Package Sprites

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
Sprites.Sprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
Object
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bullet, Enemy, Player
public abstract class Sprite extends Object implements Object
Abstract base class for all moving and animated objects in the game. Handles position, movement, animation, collision, and basic characteristics like health.
